TopicTitle: Mr Calzon02'smeet and greet, Thanks to squad.

Articles.Content: hello from Mrcalzon02! I have been a avid reader of the forums and watcher of many you-tube series about KSP for a while, been a participant since .16 it been a real fun ride so far. i am very much looking forward to the next few years. ever since i first saw the game i have been promoting it to friends and family, the game has so much fun crammed into it my very first question was why cant i give them my money faster as i tried to buy the game! I do most of my game-play stock,(0-mods) though the (engineer redux-),(mechjeb) and (Damned Robotics's) sometimes get a short install from time to time. I have thoroughly enjoyed watching KSP lets plays of , Kurt-j-mack, Scott Manley, Thor from IRD LP and Macey Dean's LP( if he's reading this, add the Heavy I-beam strut to your torps for better effect) . they all do wonderful work. we all owe squad mega-grats for the work they are doing and have done so far. will be buy this as a gift for a few friends of mine in the near future!
